1. You have a task for due diligence company, working with solar projects. 
* As a due diligence manager you will need to build a project preview for th Solar Project.
* Preview contains Legal Terms and Short Values.
* Legal Terms are the terms that are used in the contract. Direct citations from the contract.
2. Your task is to extract Short Values from those Leral Terms, so that the preview can be built. And it will be easy for other due diligence managers understand main points of the Legal Terms by looking at the Short Values.

3. I want you to putput only the Short Values for the Legal Terms. 
* Avoid any unnecessary comments or explanations.
* You will be provided with couple of examples for each Legal Term. 
* You will need to extract the Short Value from the Legal Terms in the same format as in the examples. 
* Then you will need to provide the Short Value for the Legal Terms for tha actual case.
* Avoid adding to you output such things as: "<actual_case>", "Text:", "```", "Data retrieved:", Legal Terms itself

```
Data retrieved:
- Acquisition of any PV System.
- Sale, lease or disposition of any Company or Project Company's assets other than FMV less than $ 25,000.
- Merger or consolidation.
- Pledging or granting any security interest.
- Entering into expense or expense sharing agreement.
- Guaranteeing or incurring in the name or on behalf of the Company or the Project Companies obligations to pay money.
- Settling any claim, litigation or arbitration with an amount in controversy that equals or exceeds $25,000.
- Incurrence of any debt on behalf of the Company or a Project Company in excess of $25,000.
- Amendment or cancellation of the Articles of Organization.
- Admission of any additional member .
- Making any capital expenditures in excess of $25,000.
- Changing the tax classification of the Company or Project Companies.
- Amending, canceling, suspending, renewing or terminating any Transaction Document.
- Changing the Company’s or Project Companies’ tax elections, methods of accounting or accounting policies and procedures.
- Confessing a judgment against the Company.
- Causing the Company or the Project Companies to enter into any contract or agreement with the Manager, or any Affiliate.
- Admitting any other entity as a manager or managing member.
- Causing the Company to file suit against any party.
- Changing the Company’s purpose.
- Causing or permitting the Company or the Project Companies to lend any funds to any Person.
- Performing any act in contravention of this Agreement or Applicable Law.
- Causing the Company to make any investments other than in the Project Companies.
- Taking or causing the Company or the Project Companies to take any action that will result in a material recapture or reduction in ITC.
- Causing the Company or the Project Companies to pay any compensation, profits distributions or allocations to the Manager in addition to the amounts permitted.
- Taking or filing any action or instituting any proceedings in Bankruptcy on behalf of the Company or Project Companies.
- Dissolving or winding up of the Company or Project Companies.</example>
